img_above_text:
![Wukong LowerHollow 19.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/b/b1/Wukong_LowerHollow_19.jpg)
Once the scene concludes, you'll find a new pathway to the left of the balcony. Be sure to grab a green Wisp hovering on a high ledge before dropping down into an underground tunnel.
img_below_text:
Watch out for Stone Spiders that line this webbed tunnel, and cautiously move ahead until you reach a larger "hatchery" type room.
Here, you'll find a large fissure in the ground full of cocoons, and a dozen Wasp Guai lurking all around the edge of this fissure. There's only one sloping path into the narrow pit, and it's full of Amourworms in cocoons, which means falling in from above can get very deadly, very quick.
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Wukong LowerHollow 19.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/b/b1/Wukong_LowerHollow_19.jpg)
Once the scene concludes, you'll find a new pathway to the left of the balcony. Be sure to grab a green Wisp hovering on a high ledge before dropping down into an underground tunnel."
        - Following Text: "Watch out for Stone Spiders that line this webbed tunnel, and cautiously move ahead until you reach a larger "hatchery" type room.
Here, you'll find a large fissure in the ground full of cocoons, and a dozen Wasp Guai lurking all around the edge of this fissure. There's only one sloping path into the narrow pit, and it's full of Amourworms in cocoons, which means falling in from above can get very deadly, very quick."

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a combat encounter in a dark, web-filled underground tunnel, likely part of the "Lower Hollow" area in *Black Myth: Wukong*. The player character, Wukong, is engaged in battle with a humanoid enemy wielding a fiery weapon. The setting aligns with the preceding and following text, which describe navigating through a dangerous tunnel filled with Stone Spiders and leading to a larger hatchery area. This scene emphasizes the perilous nature of the environment and the need for caution during exploration and combat.
